title: Easy Eye Light
name: easy-eye-light
description: Easy Eye Light is a code editor theme that is designed to reduce strain on the eyes and improve readability for developers. It features a light color scheme to make it easier to identify different code elements. This theme is perfect for developers who spend long hours coding, as it can help reduce fatigue and improve productivity.
author: ArunyaGoojar (https://github.com/ArunyaGoojar)
